title: Windows 11 23H2 to give you greater control over power consumption
description: Microsoft is making it easier to see how much energy your apps use in Windows 11 over a given period by introducing a detailed power consumption page in the latest 23H2 update. [...]

title: Over 15K Citrix servers likely vulnerable to CVE-2023-3519 attacks
description: Thousands of Citrix Netscaler ADC and Gateway servers exposed online are likely vulnerable against a critical remote code execution (RCE) bug exploited by unauthenticated attackers in the wild as a zero-day. [...]
